title: ON the BAD List for 20minutes
body:
Hi,
I have a problem. I get banned, for been afk after the storm came and power went out for 5. goodies woodies, not my choice. but i got back on and finish the game and WON. but still i get SPANKED for been afk for 5mins. ggthx please fix

replies.body: this happened to me so you must of done this more then 1 time as it did not happens with me this is your fult no one els
No offense intended but what is with your typing dude?
I was high as the sky at that point in time
